overview: How is the relationship between dog and owner with us? what is this phenomenon of dog fighting…?  This inveterate animal lover presented us yesterday with his short film  Crocs urbains.  Brilliantly produced, this 23-minute documentary plunged us into the urban barbarism of hound fights, a macho, phallic, clandestine world which, on the margins of society, features combat dogs programmed to kill, violent scenes which in no way condone violence.  Against this backdrop of machismo, a luscious and charming doctor describes the suffering and mistreatment of these animals and calls for an end to this kind of barbarism!
title: Urban Crocs
